translation: Dinghai (the emperor struck Chimei defeated Bundangzi descend) Euzi, Hexu, Ganyin, Xinmao, Nonchen, Kecisi, Awu, Ewu, Cushen, Dingyou, Wuxu, Hai, Genzi, Xinchu, 17 years (the world was unified) Nonin, Decimao, Anchen, Yisi (the sixteen countries of the western regions came to offer their goods) Cwu, Dingyi, Wushen, Fiyou, Gensou, Xinhai, 27 years, the world honored one thousand years until the extinction of this Nonin, Decimao, Ajin, Ewu, 31 years, Cnchen, Central Year, Dingyi, 2 years (the emperor collapsed) Chronicle of the Chronicle of the Śākyamuni, Volume 1
